name: ⚙️ SEO Metadata
description: Utility component: Search engine optimization and social media metadata. Controls how pages appear in search results and social shares.

fields.name: Internal Name
fields.helpText: Descriptive name for editors only (e.g., 'Homepage SEO', 'About Page SEO'). Not visible to users

fields.name: Meta Title

validations.message: Optimal length: 30-60 characters. Longer titles may be truncated in search results

fields.helpText: Page title for search engines and browser tabs. Include primary keyword. Ideal: 50-60 characters

fields.name: Meta Description

validations.message: Optimal length: 120-160 characters. Longer descriptions may be truncated in search results

fields.helpText: Brief page summary shown in search results. Make it compelling with relevant keywords. Ideal: 150-160 characters

fields.name: Focus Keywords

validations.message: Focus on 5-10 most relevant keywords for best results

fields.helpText: Target keywords for this page. Used for reference, not directly for SEO. Add 5-10 relevant terms

fields.name: Social Share Image

validations.message: Image dimensions should be between 600x315px and 2400x1260px. Recommended: 1200x630px for optimal display

fields.helpText: Image shown when page is shared on social media. Recommended: 1200x630px (1.9:1 ratio). Accepts 600x315px to 2400x1260px. Social platforms will crop/resize as needed.

fields.name: Hide from Search Engines
fields.helpText: Enable to prevent search engines from indexing this page. Use for private/temporary content

fields.name: Canonical URL
fields.helpText: Optional: Specify the preferred URL if content exists at multiple URLs. Prevents duplicate content issues
